about_the_game:
Devastablance. Inception of last day is the first free add-on for Devastablance. Mountain Brotherhood game. The events of the game take place after the events of the "Mountain Brotherhood" and this is just the beginning of a larger story.
The game is a 2D top-down shooter with different mechanics, unique style and story. The game consists of several levels. The first walkthrough will take 30-35 minutes.



After the "Devastablance. Mountain Brotherhood" events is an alliance between scavengers and military. Now the network of Research Institute laboratories, in which artifacts are produced from clumps of magic and radiation (which in turn have various properties), is outlawed. The legendary scavenger nicknamed "Bullet" goes with his friend to one of these laboratories, where he must get three legendary artifacts. But something is not going according to plan... What is it? You will find out in the game!



-Dynamic and interesting gameplay.
-Many different mechanics that dilute the passage.
-Unique visual style.
-Lots of secrets and references.
-The first playthrough takes 30-35 minutes.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features unrealistic violence of fictional characters using unrealistic blood. At some points in the game there are unrealistic corpses.
